TopicTitle: Rockets? TurboJet? RamJet? Bah! Who needs them anyway

Articles.Content:
I made an engineless aircraft, it can take off without assistance and stay airborne for as long you bother to keep it airborne. I don\'t know why it works other then that its Kerbal and anything goes 8)

Craft file https://dl.dropbox.com/u/7252435/NO%20ENGINE.craft save/move to ksp/ships/sph.

Boring youtube (takes 30 seconds to get airborne) video http://youtu.be/gUtcCn-Ru0M
Lol. Looks ridiculous. Flys ridiculous. Love it.
It has excellent control and a sharp turn radius. Seems like a great way to fly.

i rember when i made my first rocket-plane in .14

even when i pointed the plane down, it still rose.

I only had 2 wings on it tho
